publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3674 Cathie Craigie: Celebrating 25 Years of TPAS Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the Tenant Participation Advisory Service (TPAS) in its 25th year; notes its successful recent conference with a record number of delegates; recognises the work TPAS Scotland has done over the years in promoting tenants’ interests and providing training for tenants to ensure that they are aware of their rights, and hopes that TPAS Scotland goes from strength to strength over the next 25 years.
S2M-3674 Celebrating 25 Years of TPAS Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3674 Cathie Craigie: Celebrating 25 Years of TPAS Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the Tenant Participation Advisory Service (TPAS) in its 25th year; notes its successful recent conference with a record number of delegates; recognises the work TPAS Scotland has done over the years in promoting tenants’ interests and providing training for tenants to ensure that they are aware of their rights, and hopes that TPAS Scotland goes from strength to strength over the next 25 years. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3674 Celebrating 25 Years of TPAS Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Michael McMahon*
S2M-3674 Celebrating 25 Years of TPAS Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Elaine Smith*
